item.title: The Master Command- Those who have it please help me
item.dc:creator: @Wolf_Carmen Wolf_Carmen
item.description:
@Wolf_Carmen wrote:

Ok this is what i have for my masters command… Tell me if it’s right… and tell me what’s wrong… because when i compile it, it works… but when i use it in game… It gives me a connection lost :(…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerRights >= 3)
{
addSkillXP(200000000, 8654);
addSkillXP(200000000, 8657);
addSkillXP(200000000, 8660);
addSkillXP(200000000, 8663);
addSkillXP(200000000, 8666);
addSkillXP(200000000, 8669);
addSkillXP(200000000, 86);
addSkillXP(200000000, 8655);
addSkillXP(200000000, 8658);
addSkillXP(200000000, 8661);
addSkillXP(200000000, 8664);
addSkillXP(200000000, 8667);
addSkillXP(200000000, 8670);
addSkillXP(200000000, 12162);
addSkillXP(200000000, 8656);
addSkillXP(200000000, 8659);
addSkillXP(200000000, 8662);
addSkillXP(200000000, 8665);
addSkillXP(200000000, 8668);
addSkillXP(200000000, 8671);
addSkillXP(200000000, 13928);
sendMessage(“You are now a Master of the SERVERNAME”);
}
